component.name: Budgie Screenshot Applet
component.summary: Take a screenshot of your desktop, a window or region; save to disk and upload

description.p: Take a screenshot of your desktop, a window or region; save to disk and upload. Budgie Screenshot Applet lives in your panel and features a clean interface for quickly grabing and sharing screenshots. It allows you to choose from various upload services. You can also store screenshots locally without uploading them.
Among other things, Screenshot Applet can:

ul.li: Take a screenshot of your whole desktop, window or a selected area on the screen
Upload your screenshots to various online services
Keep a history of your screenshots
